innhold.avsnitt: You can also combine the parental benefit with work. You can choose between:

liste.punkt: working full-time and postponing you parental benefit period
working part-time and extending your parental benefit period

innhold.avsnitt: If you work part-time, the parental benefit is reduced according to how much you work. At the same time, your parental benefit period will be extended. You can only work for one employer at a time.
If you and your partner wish to spend your parental benefit periods at the same time, the coverage cannot exceed more than 100 per cent in total. Note that both parents must apply.
